synopsis.text: Accepting a life of delinquency after his mother's tragic death at the hands of the merciless Count Mecha, young Tetsuro clings to a single dream: to board the legendary Galaxy Express 999. This interstellar train promises to deliver him to a faraway planet where he can exchange his human form for an invincible robotic body, allowing him to exact vengeance upon his mother's killer. Fortune smiles upon Tetsuro when, during a narrow escape from the authorities, he encounters the captivating Maetel, a woman bearing a striking resemblance to his late mother. She extends an offer he cannot refuse: a journey aboard the Galaxy Express 999 alongside her. As Tetsuro embarks on this cosmic adventure, he encounters a diverse array of characters, ultimately learning valuable lessons about humanity and the true cost of vengeance.
